targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cucumber")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "f199a2094793")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cucumber")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "light" or r["_field"] == "hum" or r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "f199a2094793")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_id"] == "60:55:F9:ED:36:E8")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "cucumber/sensors/60:55:F9:ED:36:E8")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
